problem.markdown:
Electrostatic Potential is a nonbonded interaction (x) True ( ) False
The curvature of the internuclear potential energy is related to the spring constant (x) True ( ) False
Electrostatic potential decays rapidly with distance. (x) True ( ) False
If the charge on the partcles is doubled the force is unchanged. ( ) True (x) False
If the distance between the particles is halved,the force is quadrapoled. (x) True ( ) False
problem.p: Electrostatic Potential is a nonbonded interaction
The curvature of the internuclear potential energy is related to the spring constant
Electrostatic potential decays rapidly with distance.
If the charge on the partcles is doubled the force is unchanged.
If the distance between the particles is halved,the force is quadrapoled.
